page.title: 16Housing
page.content: { In Grimethorpe there are various types of houses.There are terraced houses,bungalows and semi detached houses. There are three parts to Grimethorpe which are White city,Red city and the village In the village there are terraced houses,a number of these are being refurbished by the Yorkshire Housing Association. In White city most of the houses were owned by the N.C.B. There are concrete and brick houses. White city got its name by the white pebble-dash houses built before the others. In Red city nearly all the houses are owned by the council,there are semi detached houses and bungalows.There are bungalows and flats for the elderly supervised by wardens.
